00021 void PWM_InitFrequency(int frequency){  
00022         PWM_InitPeriod(13824000 / frequency);
00023         return ;

00034 void PWM_SetPercentage(int channel,int percentage){
00035         PWM_Set(channel,globalperiod * percentage / 100);

00061 void PWM_InitChannel213x(int channel,int level){
00062 //      int i;
00063 //      int n;
00064 
00065         switch(channel){                                
00066                 case 1: PINSEL0 |= 1<< 1; break;        // set p0.0 to PWM1
00067                 case 2: PINSEL0 |= 1<<15; break;        // set p0.7 to PWM2
00068                 case 3: PINSEL0 |= 1<< 3; break;        // set p0.1 to PWM3
00069                 case 4: PINSEL0 |= 1<<17; break;        // set p0.8 to PWM4
00070                 case 5: PINSEL1 |= 1<<10; break; // set p0.21 to PWM5
00071                 case 6: PINSEL0 |= 1<<19; break;        // set p0.9 to PWM6                        
00072         } 
00073 
00074         PWMPCR |= 1<<(8+channel);       //The PWM output enable
00075         PWMMCR |= (1<<1);                       //PWM match control reg: reset timer counter if MR0 matches
00076 
00077         switch(channel){                        //set motor PWM width                           
00078                 case 1: PWMMR1 = level; break;
00079                 case 2: PWMMR2 = level; break;
00080                 case 3: PWMMR3 = level; break;
00081                 case 4: PWMMR4 = level; break;
00082                 case 5: PWMMR5 = level; break;
00083                 case 6: PWMMR6 = level; break;
00084         } 
00085 
00086         PWMLER |= 1<<channel;           //latch enable register
00087         PWMTCR |= (1<<0) | (1<<3);      //counter enable, PWM enable
00088 
00089         //      for(n = 0 ; n < 100 ; n++){             //safety buffer
00090         //              for(i=0 ; i< 450; i++){}
00091 return ;
00092 }
00093 
00100 void PWM_Set213x(int channel,int level){
00101 
00102         switch(channel){
00103                 case 1: PWMMR1 = level; break;
00104                 case 2: PWMMR2 = level; break;
00105                 case 3: PWMMR3 = level; break;
00106                 case 4: PWMMR4 = level; break;
00107                 case 5: PWMMR5 = level; break;
00108                 case 6: PWMMR6 = level; break;
00109         } 
00110         PWMLER |= (1<<channel);
00111         return ;
00112 }

00127 void PWM_InitOutput(void){
00129         T0EMR=(0x01 <<0)|(0x01 <<2);
00130         T1EMR=(0x01 <<0)|(0x01 <<1)|(0x01 <<2);
00131         T2EMR=(0x01 <<1)|(0x01 <<2);
00132         T3EMR=(0x01 <<0)|(0x01 <<3);
00133         /****/
00134 
00136         T0EMR|=(0x01 <<4)|(0x01 <<8);
00137         T1EMR|=(0x01 <<4)|(0x01 <<6)|(0x01 <<8);
00138         T2EMR|=(0x01 <<6)|(0x01 <<8);
00139         T3EMR|=(0x01 <<4)|(0x01 <<10);
00140 
00141         T0MCR|=(1 <<10);
00142         T1MCR|=(1 <<10);
00143         T2MCR|=(1 <<10);
00144         T3MCR|=(1 <<4);
00145 
00147         T0PWMCON|=(0x01 <<0)|(0x01 <<2);
00148         T1PWMCON|=(0x01 <<0)|(0x01 <<1)|(0x01 <<2);
00149         T2PWMCON|=(0x01 <<1)|(0x01 <<2);
00150         T3PWMCON|=(0x01 <<0)|(0x01 <<3);
00151         /****/
00152 
00154         T0TCR = 1; T1TCR = 1; T2TCR = 1; T3TCR = 1;
00155         /****/
00156         return ;
00157 }

00166 void PWM_InitPeriod2103(int period){            //Init the PWM Period
00167         T0MR3 = period;
00168         T1MR3 = period;
00169         T2MR3 = period;
00170         T3MR1 = period;
00171         globalperiod = period;
00172         PWM_InitOutput();
00173         return ;
00174 }

00187 void PWM_InitChannel2103(int channel,int level){
00188 //      int i;
00189 //      int n;
00190         switch(channel){                                
00191                 case 0: PINSEL0 |= (0x02 <<6);
00192                 case 2: PINSEL1 |= (0x02 <<0);                     
00193                 case 10:PINSEL0 |= (0x02 <<24);
00194                 case 11:PINSEL0 |= (0x02 <<26);
00195                 case 12:PINSEL1 |= (0x02 <<6);
00196                 case 21:PINSEL0 |= (0x02 <<16);
00197                 case 22:PINSEL0 |= (0x02 <<18);
00198                 case 30:PINSEL1 |= (0x02 <<10);
00199                 case 33:PINSEL1 |= (0x02 <<28);
00200         } 
00201         PWM_Set(channel,level); 
00202         //      for(n = 0 ; n < 100 ; n++){             //safety buffer
00203         //              for(i=0 ; i< 450; i++){}
00204 return ;
00205 }

00214 void PWM_Set2103(int channel,int level){
00215         _setPWM(channel/10,channel%10,level);
00216         return ;
00217 }

00226 void _setPWM(int timer, int channel, int value){
00227         value = globalperiod - value;
00228         if (value == globalperiod) value = globalperiod + 100;
00229         switch (timer){
00230                 case 0:
00231                         switch (channel){
00232                                 case 0: T0MR0 = value; break;
00233                                 case 1: T0MR1 = value; break;
00234                                 case 2: T0MR2 = value; break;
00235                                 case 3: T0MR3 = value; break;
00236                         }
00237                         break;
00238 
00239                 case 1:
00240                         switch (channel){
00241                                 case 0: T1MR0 = value; break;
00242                                 case 1: T1MR1 = value; break;
00243                                 case 2: T1MR2 = value; break;
00244                                 case 3: T1MR3 = value; break;
00245                         }
00246                         break;
00247                 case 2:
00248                         switch (channel){
00249                                 case 0: T2MR0 = value; break;
00250                                 case 1: T2MR1 = value; break;
00251                                 case 2: T2MR2 = value; break;
00252                                 case 3: T2MR3 = value; break;
00253                         }
00254                         break;
00255                 case 3:
00256                         switch (channel){
00257                                 case 0: T3MR0 = value; break;
00258                                 case 1: T3MR1 = value; break;
00259                                 case 2: T3MR2 = value; break;
00260                                 case 3: T3MR3 = value; break;
00261                         }
00262                         break;
00263         }
00264 }
